content.rendered: Malware doesn’t just affect your PC anymore, it’s gotten personal. Through ransomware and webcam spying, hackers can get to your most personal files and photos. AVG Internet Security now comes with new Webcam Protection and Ransomware Protection features to secure your most personal files — and your private life. Give your PC AVG’s best-in-class Internet Security.
